field.name: summary
field.value: Allow for Non-Primary Key for the "one" side of a one-to-many association.

field.name: description
field.value:
From MSSQL 2005 BOL: "Make a one-to-many relationship if only one of the related columns is a primary key or has a unique constraint."
see: http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms190651(SQL.90).aspx
However, AR only supports one-to-many relationships where the "one" side is a Primary Key.
